comment.author: 47524421@N08
comment._content:
Ford 5-AT-B Tri-Motor N9683 (c/n 5-AT-39).  
Below, it was photographed by Tom Kirn in 1960 at Rochester, NY, while on a publicity tour.

[http://www.flickr.com/photos/batman60/8523564941/in/photostream]



This airplane currently hangs in the Smithsonian Air and Space Museum.
